text.div:
Payment Adjustment Code

CodeDescriptionCommentVersion
1 No payment adjustmentadded v2.4
2 Designated current drug or biological payment adjustment applies to APC (status indicator G)added v2.4
3 Designated new device payment adjustment applies to APC (status indicator H)added v2.4
4 Designated new drug or new biological payment adjustment applies to APC (status indicator J)added v2.4
5 Deductible not applicable (specific list of HCPCS codes)added v2.4

name: v2.0468
title: v2 Payment adjustment code
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0468 ( Payment adjustment code)
